title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 2.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 2.1 - General

State Regulations

No foreign banking corporation may establish, maintain or
use a representative office in this State without having first obtained a
license from the superintendent. Representative offices of foreign banking
corporations that were lawfully registered under article V-B of the Banking Law
on or before September 1, 1992 shall be required to obtain a license from the
superintendent to maintain such representative office prior to September 1, 1994. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
